body_html: It would be nice if the person implementing this could then also add the to(Layout) overload to at::Tensor. There is already test code in test/cpp/api/tensor.cpp to test this, just needs to be uncommented once it works :)
body_text: It would be nice if the person implementing this could then also add the to(Layout) overload to at::Tensor. There is already test code in test/cpp/api/tensor.cpp to test this, just needs to be uncommented once it works :)
body: It would be nice if the person implementing this could then also add the `to(Layout)` overload to `at::Tensor`. There is already test code in `test/cpp/api/tensor.cpp` to test this, just needs to be uncommented once it works :)
